column4: man setupterm say no man , how to find this func in which package ? apt-get what
man a func ,but the man-doc not installed
i don't know about setupterm command ..maybe i miss or nothing there
it is not a command , it is : 3   Library calls (functions within program libraries)
setupterm is not : 1   Executable programs or shell commands
try with man -k setupterm to search
It must install xxx-doc first to use man -k xxx
if i'm not wrong, cmiiw, thats for manual of library calls
usually,manual doc for a lot of system calls was installed by default
but I install ubuntu server only, how to find the package which I need install : example sudo apt-get install glibc-doc
I got it : apt-file search setupterm ,thanks .
sorry, i'm wrong...man 2 was for system call, and man3 was for library calls manual
